meanings.definition: To include as a necessary part or result.
meanings.sent1: The recipe will involve mixing all the ingredients together.
meanings.sent2: The project will involve teamwork from all members.
meanings.sent3: I never thought baking a cake would involve so much mixing!
meanings.sent4: Her speech will involve everyone in the audience emotionally.
meanings.sent5: The adventure will involve crossing a treacherous bridge.

meanings.sent1: The teacher will involve all students in the class discussion.
meanings.sent2: The coach will involve every player in the game.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick will involve a volunteer from the audience.
meanings.sent4: The detective will involve the suspect in the interrogation.
meanings.sent5: The event will involve inviting guests to participate.

meanings.definition: To occupy or engage the interest or attention of.
meanings.sent1: The movie will involve the audience from start to finish.
meanings.sent2: The book will involve readers in its captivating story.
meanings.sent3: The game will involve players in a thrilling challenge.
meanings.sent4: The painting will involve viewers with its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The performance will involve spectators with its mesmerizing music.
